title: Blind pick should be deleted from this game.
body:
Why is this still a thing? IT. IS. NOT. HEALTHY.

This is how blind pick goes:

Summoner one: mid
Summoner two: mid
*summoner two instalocks*

You can guess what happens next, toxicity takes over and it is not fun.

Riot, please, and i mean PLEASE bring in Normal Draft/Team builder. I don't want to play ranked. 

For those out of the loop EUNE had blind pick for a while and after constant complaints they finally got normal draft.. 

Riot say they cant support two queues.. WELL GET RID OF BLIND PICK.
